Literature.Title: A Comparative Study of the Antimicrobial and Structural Properties of Short Peptides and Lipopeptides Containing a Repetitive Motif KLFK.
Literature.Author: Húmpola MV, Rey MC, Spontón PG, Simonetta AC, Tonarelli GG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=42.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=168.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>168.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus BSF FBCB1313(MIC=21.0µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=84.0µM),Candida albicans DBFIQ 1(MIC=>344.0µM),Candida albicans PEEC 2(MIC=344.0µM),Candida tropicalis DBFIQ 3(MIC=>344.0µM)
